languages.text: "Леди Зауэрбэк, не припомните ли вы случай, когда я подстрекал офицера или блюстителя к неподчинению его командиру? Отменял приказ, данный ему? Демонстрировал фаворитизм в отношении недостойных того?"

"Mistress Sauerback, can you recall an occasion where I would encourage an officer to disobey their superior? Or one where I would overrule their order? Or show favouritism to those who merited none?"
languages.original_text: "Леди Зауэрбэк, не припомните ли вы случай, когда я подстрекал офицера или блюстителя к неподчинению его командиру? Отменял приказ, данный ему? Демонстрировал фаворитизм в отношении недостойных того?"

traits.locale_text: "Mistress Sauerback, can you recall an occasion where I would encourage an officer to disobey their superior? Or one where I would overrule their order? Or show favouritism to those who merited none?"

"Mistress Sauerback, can you recall an occasion where I would encourage an officer to disobey their superior? Or one where I would overrule their order? Or show favouritism to those who merited none?"

"Mistress Sauerback, can you recall an occasion where I would encourage an officer to disobey their superior? Or one where I would overrule their order? Or show favouritism to those who merited none?"

"Mistress Sauerback, can you recall an occasion where I would encourage an officer to disobey their superior? Or one where I would overrule their order? Or show favouritism to those who merited none?"

"Mistress Sauerback, can you recall an occasion where I would encourage an officer to disobey their superior? Or one where I would overrule their order? Or show favouritism to those who merited none?"

"Mistress Sauerback, can you recall an occasion where I would encourage an officer to disobey their superior? Or one where I would overrule their order? Or show favouritism to those who merited none?"

languages.text: "Meisterin Sauerback, könnt Ihr Euch an eine Gelegenheit erinnern, in dem ich einen Offizier ermutigt habe, seinen Vorgesetzten zu missachten? Oder eine Gelegenheit, in der ich einen Befehl überstimmt habe? Habe ich jemals jemanden bevorzugt, der es nicht verdient hat?"
languages.original_text: "Mistress Sauerback, can you recall an occasion where I would encourage an officer to disobey their superior? Or one where I would overrule their order? Or show favouritism to those who merited none?"

traits.locale_text: "Meisterin Sauerback, könnt Ihr Euch an eine Gelegenheit erinnern, in dem ich einen Offizier ermutigt habe, seinen Vorgesetzten zu missachten? Oder eine Gelegenheit, in der ich einen Befehl überstimmt habe? Habe ich jemals jemanden bevorzugt, der es nicht verdient hat?"

languages.text: « Maîtresse Sauerback, vous souvenez-vous d'une seule occasion où j'aurais encouragé un officier à désobéir à ses supérieurs ? Où je serais passé outre leurs ordres ? Où j'aurais fait preuve de favoritisme envers ceux qui ne le méritaient pas ? »
languages.original_text: "Mistress Sauerback, can you recall an occasion where I would encourage an officer to disobey their superior? Or one where I would overrule their order? Or show favouritism to those who merited none?"

traits.locale_text: « Maîtresse Sauerback, vous souvenez-vous d'une seule occasion où j'aurais encouragé un officier à désobéir à ses supérieurs ? Où je serais passé outre leurs ordres ? Où j'aurais fait preuve de favoritisme envers ceux qui ne le méritaient pas ? »

languages.text: «Señora Sauerback, ¿recuerda alguna ocasión en que yo alentase a un oficial a desobedecer a un superior? ¿O que haya invalidado una orden suya? ¿O mostrado favoritismo hacia quienes no lo merecieran?».
languages.original_text: "Mistress Sauerback, can you recall an occasion where I would encourage an officer to disobey their superior? Or one where I would overrule their order? Or show favouritism to those who merited none?"

traits.locale_text: «Señora Sauerback, ¿recuerda alguna ocasión en que yo alentase a un oficial a desobedecer a un superior? ¿O que haya invalidado una orden suya? ¿O mostrado favoritismo hacia quienes no lo merecieran?».

languages.text: 「ザウアーバック様、私が士官に上官に逆らうよう勧めたことがあったでしょうか？あるいは、私が上官の命令を覆すようなことはありましたか？もしくは、何の役にも立たない者に贔屓をしたことがあったでしょうか？」
languages.original_text: "Mistress Sauerback, can you recall an occasion where I would encourage an officer to disobey their superior? Or one where I would overrule their order? Or show favouritism to those who merited none?"

traits.locale_text: 「ザウアーバック様、私が士官に上官に逆らうよう勧めたことがあったでしょうか？あるいは、私が上官の命令を覆すようなことはありましたか？もしくは、何の役にも立たない者に贔屓をしたことがあったでしょうか？」

languages.text: “苏尔贝克女士，我想请你回忆一下，我什么时候鼓励过军官违背上级的命令？我什么时候忤逆过上级的命令？或者说，我什么时候优待过那些才不配位的人？”
languages.original_text: "Mistress Sauerback, can you recall an occasion where I would encourage an officer to disobey their superior? Or one where I would overrule their order? Or show favouritism to those who merited none?"

traits.locale_text: “苏尔贝克女士，我想请你回忆一下，我什么时候鼓励过军官违背上级的命令？我什么时候忤逆过上级的命令？或者说，我什么时候优待过那些才不配位的人？”

languages.text: "Sauerback Hanım; bir subayı üstüne itaatsizlik etmeye teşvik ettiğim, bahsi geçen üstlerin verdikleri emirleri bozduğum ya da hak etmeyen kişilere iltimas geçtiğim herhangi bir durum hatırlıyor musun?"
languages.original_text: "Mistress Sauerback, can you recall an occasion where I would encourage an officer to disobey their superior? Or one where I would overrule their order? Or show favouritism to those who merited none?"
